#summary Available api commands
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

Following is a list of available api commands for foodoserver


= Restaurants =
{{{
/api/<restaurants/
}}}
Lists all restaurants

{{{
/api/<restaurant_id>/
}}}
Details for restaurant with id: {{{<restaurant_id>}}}

{{{
/api/<restaurant_id>/reviews/
}}}
Reviews for restaurant with id: {{{<restaurant_id>}}}

{{{
/api/<restaurant_id>/menu/
}}}
Menu for restaurant with id: {{{<restaurant_id>}}}

{{{
/api/<restaurant_id>/rate/<rating>/<apikey>/
}}}
Submits rating for restaurant with id: {{{<restaurant_id>}}} for user with unique {{{<apikey>}}}


= Types =
{{{
/api/types/
}}}
List of all registered restaurants types

= Users = 
{{{
/api/users/signup/?username=<username>&password=<password>[&firstname=<firstname>][&lastname=<lastname>]
}}}
Registers new user. firstname and lastname are optional

{{{
/api/users/login/?username=<username>&password=<password>
}}}
Returns user object with api key for further interaction with the API
